prompt_base: raw photo, 10 year old caucasian boy, short spiky blonde crew cut, red t-shirt, mischievous smirk, realistic eyes, slightly sun-tanned skin
feature_prompt: skin texture, sun freckles, dirt smudges, cotton fabric texture, denim, uneven skin tone, 8k uhd, sharp focus, cinematic lighting, realistic hair roots
negative_prompt: yellow skin, flesh hair, cone head, cartoon, anime, 3d render, plastic, doll, toy, smooth skin, perfect skin, lowres, blurry
